expo.name: Copango
expo.description: Healthcare Staff Portal - Communication and task management for healthcare teams

infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app may access calendar data to help schedule healthcare tasks and appointments for staff coordination.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app may access contacts to help healthcare staff communicate and coordinate with team members.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app may access the camera to capture photos for healthcare documentation and requests.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access photos to attach images to healthcare requests and documentation.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may access the microphone for voice recordings related to healthcare documentation.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app may access location to help track staff locations for emergency coordination and task assignment.
infoPlist.NSNotificationsUsageDescription: This app sends notifications to keep healthcare staff informed about urgent requests and updates.
